summary: Adds a unique replacer for Bloodthorn. Built from scratch custom meshes and high rez textures.
descriptionHtml:
Bloodthorn Replacer

What is this mod?

Adds a unique replacer for Bloodthorn. Built from scratch custom meshes and high rez textures.

http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Bloodthorn

http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Bloodthorn

Underrated little dagger great for a Witch/Assassin character build. I added the drain health to the description in the inventory and turned off the enchant shader but other then that it's a straight mesh and textures replacer. Hope you get some fun from it :)
=======================================================================================
[youtube]3HVNe_rJAE0[/youtube] [youtube]JnfaSh3vW3g[/youtube]


=======================================================================

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Help bloodthorn 4

Player.additem XX 000A4DCE 1

in the console.

=======================================================================


INSTALLATION

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM.

To manually install, just download the file and extract the files into the data folder. Don't forget to activate the .esp ;)

=======================================================================
author: KettleWitch
